sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; export default function Navbar() { const cartstate = useSelector((state) => state.cartReducer); const userstate = useSelector((state) => state.loginUserReducer); const { currentUser } = userstate; return (
Golden Games
    {currentUser ? (
    {currentUser.name}
    Action Another action Something else here
    ) : (
  • Login
    • )}
  • Cart {cartstate.cartItems.length}
); }
